com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Class UndirectedSimpleVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.AbstractVertex
      • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.DirectedSimpleVertex
        • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedSimpleVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vertex
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UndirectedBfsVertex

    public class UndirectedSimpleVertex
extends DirectedSimpleVertex
    Vertex to be used in undirected graphs. Adds and removes adjacencies in both directions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UndirectedSimpleVertex()
      Default constructor initializes graph to null and creates an empty adjacency list

    • Method Detail

      • addAdjacency

        public final <T extends Vertex> boolean addAdjacency(T to)
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Adds the specified vertex to the set of adjacencies. Note that this method only adds a directed adjacency. If the vertex belongs to an undirected graph, the graph will be put into an inconsistent state if an adjacency (u, v) is added using this method without also adding the directed adjacency (v, u)!
        Specified by:
        addAdjacency in interface Vertex
        Overrides:
        addAdjacency in class DirectedSimpleVertex
        Parameters:
        to - vertex to be added
        Returns:
        true if the adjacency list did not already contain to

      • removeAdjacency

        public final boolean removeAdjacency(Vertex to)
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Removes the specified vertex from the adjacency set. Note that this method only removes a directed adjacency.
        Specified by:
        removeAdjacency in interface Vertex
        Overrides:
        removeAdjacency in class DirectedSimpleVertex
        Parameters:
        to - vertex to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the vertex was found in the adjacency set

      • clearAdjacencies

        public final void clearAdjacencies()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Removes all vertices from the adjacency set. The adjacency set will be empty after this call returns. The cautionary statements regarding the use of removeAdjacency() in an undirected graph also apply to this method.
        Specified by:
        clearAdjacencies in interface Vertex
        Overrides:
        clearAdjacencies in class DirectedSimpleVertex
